lyrics.text:
’Oku ‘i he Laumālie,
Ke ne faka’ilo,
Ki he loto ‘oku feinga,
’A Sīsū Kalaisi.

He ‘oku ne tokoni mai,
Ki he loto vaivai
Ke hoko ai, ‘a e tui,
Ke nau mo’ui ai.

Pea mo e ‘ofa lahi,
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
‘Oku ‘ikai fa’a ‘ilo,
‘E he angahia.

’O e ‘ofa, ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ki he kakai hia,
‘Oku ‘i he Laumālie,
Ke ne faka’ilo.
